nodes.text: Gerrenthum, a world located in the Anoat sector of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories, was orbited by an orbital security station.

During the Iron Blockade, which was established by the Galactic Empire Empire in an attempt to prevent news of their crushing defeat by the Alliance to Restore the Republic at the Battle of Endor from reaching the Anoat sector's populace, Leeka Pali asked for a small team to board the station and disable the world's orbital alarm beacons so the Trade Spine League could move their larger ships out of the system, and the Smuggler sent three of his crew members to complete the job.
Gerrenthum's orbital security station was first mentioned in the canon mobile game Star Wars: Uprising, which was developed by Kabam for iOS and Android platforms and released in 2015.
